languages.text: "Все это время... я думал... я искренне полагал, что ты..." {n}Маражай срывается в глухое шипение.{/n} "Довольно. Ты... все испортил{mf||а}, мон-кай. Я больше не приду к тебе. И ты... ты можешь забыть о том, что было. Я больше не буду тратить на тебя и твои слабости свое время".

"All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."
languages.original_text: "Все это время... я думал... я искренне полагал, что ты..." {n}Маражай срывается в глухое шипение.{/n} "Довольно. Ты... все испортил{mf||а}, мон-кай. Я больше не приду к тебе. И ты... ты можешь забыть о том, что было. Я больше не буду тратить на тебя и твои слабости свое время".

traits.locale_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

"All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

"All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

"All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

languages.text: “这么长时间以来……我以为……我真的以为你会……”{n}玛拉斋发出了低沉的嘶嘶声。{/n}“够了，你……你把一切都毁了，猴子。我不会再来找你了，而你……你可以忘记我们之间发生过的一切。我再也不会把时间浪费在你和你那些弱点上了。”
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: “这么长时间以来……我以为……我真的以为你会……”{n}玛拉斋发出了低沉的嘶嘶声。{/n}“够了，你……你把一切都毁了，猴子。我不会再来找你了，而你……你可以忘记我们之间发生过的一切。我再也不会把时间浪费在你和你那些弱点上了。”

languages.text: 「ずっと…思ってた…本当に、お前だと…」{n}マラズハイは低くシューと声を漏らす。{/n}「もういい。お前のせいで…すべて台無しだ、モン＝ケイ。もうお前に会いに来ない。それから…俺達のことは忘れたらいい。お前とその弱さに、もう無駄な時間は割かない」
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: 「ずっと…思ってた…本当に、お前だと…」{n}マラズハイは低くシューと声を漏らす。{/n}「もういい。お前のせいで…すべて台無しだ、モン＝ケイ。もうお前に会いに来ない。それから…俺達のことは忘れたらいい。お前とその弱さに、もう無駄な時間は割かない」

languages.text: «Todo este tiempo... creía... de verdad creía que tú...». {n}Marazhai suelta un bufido.{/n} «Basta. Tú... lo has estropeado todo, mon-keigh. No volveré a acudir a ti. Y tú... ya te puedes ir olvidando de lo que ha ocurrido entre nosotros. No malgastaré más tiempo contigo ni con tu debilidad».
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: «Todo este tiempo... creía... de verdad creía que tú...». {n}Marazhai suelta un bufido.{/n} «Basta. Tú... lo has estropeado todo, mon-keigh. No volveré a acudir a ti. Y tú... ya te puedes ir olvidando de lo que ha ocurrido entre nosotros. No malgastaré más tiempo contigo ni con tu debilidad».

languages.text: « Pendant tout ce temps, j'ai cru... j'ai vraiment cru que vous... » {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement grave.{/n} « Tant pis. Vous avez tout gâché, mon-keigh. Je vous ai assez {mf|vu|vue}. Oubliez ce qui s'est passé entre nous. J'ai fini de perdre mon temps avec vous et vos faiblesses. »
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant tout ce temps, j'ai cru... j'ai vraiment cru que vous... » {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement grave.{/n} « Tant pis. Vous avez tout gâché, mon-keigh. Je vous ai assez {mf|vu|vue}. Oubliez ce qui s'est passé entre nous. J'ai fini de perdre mon temps avec vous et vos faiblesses. »

languages.text: "Die ganze Zeit über ... Dachte ich ... Dachte ich wirklich, dass Ihr ..." {n}Marazhai zischt leise.{/n} "Genug. Ihr ... habt alles ruiniert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Und Ihr ... vergesst einfach, was zwischen uns passiert ist. Ich werde keinerlei Zeit mehr für Euch und Eure Schwächen aufbringen."
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: "Die ganze Zeit über ... Dachte ich ... Dachte ich wirklich, dass Ihr ... {n}Marazhai zischt leise.{/n} "Genug. Ihr ... habt alles ruiniert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Und Ihr ... vergesst einfach, was zwischen uns passiert ist. Ich werde keinerlei Zeit mehr für Euch und Eure Schwächen aufbringen."

languages.text: "Bunca zaman... Sanmıştım ki... Gerçekten sanmıştım ki sen..." {n}Marazhai, kısık bir sesle tıslıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Sen... Her şeyi mahvettin mon-keigh. Yanına tekrar gelmeyeceğim. Ayrıca sen... Aramızda olanları unutabilirsin. Sen ve senin zayıflıklarınla vaktimi daha fazla harcamayacağım."
languages.original_text: "All this time... I thought... I honestly thought that you..." {n}Marazhai lets out a low hiss.{/n} "Enough. You... have ruined everything, mon-keigh. I will not come to you again. And you... you can forget what happened between us. I will not waste any more of my time on you and your weaknesses."

traits.locale_text: "Bunca zaman... Sanmıştım ki... Gerçekten sanmıştım ki sen..." {n}Marazhai, kısık bir sesle tıslıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Sen... Her şeyi mahvettin mon-keigh. Yanına tekrar gelmeyeceğim. Ayrıca sen... Aramızda olanları unutabilirsin. Sen ve senin zayıflıklarınla vaktimi daha fazla harcamayacağım."
